news_header: Four city vice mayors in New York have announced their intention to resign, following calls for Mayor Eric Adams to step down amid allegations of campaign funding from the Turkish regime and pressure regarding the Turkish consulate.
news_original_title: New Yorkin hallinto kaaoksen partaalla – kaupunginvaltuusto vaati pormestaria eroamaan
news_text: Despite these pressures and a request from the US Department of Justice to drop charges against him, Adams has denied any wrongdoing and refuses to resign. The situation has sparked criticism from various political factions, and the final decision on the charges will be made by a federal judge.
